vans.name: Modest Explorer
vans.description: The Modest Explorer is a van designed to get you out of the house and into ature This beauty is equipped with solar panels a composting toilet a water tank and kitchenette. The idea is that you can pack up your home and escape for a weekend or even longer!

vans.name: Beach Bum
vans.description: Beach Bum is a van inspired by surfers and travelers. It was created to be a portable home away from home, but with some cool features in it you won t find in an ordinary camper.

vans.name: Relable Red
vans.description: Relable Red is a van designed to get you out of the house and into ature This beauty is equipped with solar panels a composting toilet a water tank and kitchenette. The idea is that you can pack up your home and escape for a weekend or even longer!

vans.name: Dreamfinder
vans.description: Dreamfinder is the perfect van to travel in and experience. With a ceiling height of 2.1m, you can stand up in this van and there is great head room. The floor is a beautiful glass reinforced plastic (GRP) which is easy to clean and very hard wearing. A large rear window and large side windows make it really light inside and keep it well ventilated.

vans.name: The Cruiser
vans.description: The Cruiser is a van for those who love to travel incomfort and luxury. With its many windows, spacious interior and ample storage space, the Cruiser offers a beautiful view wherever you go.
